posts.post_title: FT: Chief Meyers Old Mill PSA 6.5
posts.post_content:
Would like to trade this PSA 6.5 Meyers for a Meyers with a Cycle 460, EPDG or 
Sweet Cap 350-460 fact. 42, 42OS. If you have any to trade let me know.
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]
Hello- would you sell it straight out? Thanks-kevin
